name: Claude Sonnet 4.6
desc: Near-Opus performance at Sonnet pricing. Introduces Agent Teams capability for multi-agent collaboration.

name: Gemini 3.1 Pro
desc: Google's latest flagship reclaims top benchmark position. Massive context window, deep multimodal understanding.

name: GPT-5.2 Codex
desc: Specialized coding variant (~200B). 96.1% on HumanEval, SOTA on SWE-Bench. Enhanced agentic software engineering.

name: Grok 4.1
desc: Top of LMArena at 1483 Elo. Real-time data integration via X. Focus on conversational intelligence.

name: Llama 4 Maverick
desc: 1.04T MoE open-weight model, first to rank #1 on LMSYS Chatbot Arena. Up to 100 sub-agents in K2.5 swarms.

name: DeepSeek V4
desc: Engram memory architecture with 1M+ token context. Targets coding dominance. Open-weight, consumer-hardware compatible. Mid-Feb launch slipped ‚Äî imminent.
note: ‚ö†Ô∏è Previous V3 release caused -17% Nvidia crash

name: Kimi K2.5
desc: Moonshot AI open-weight flagship (1T params MoE, 32B active). Agent Swarm: up to 100 parallel sub-agents, 4.5x faster. 50.2% on HLE. Trained on 15T mixed vision+text tokens with MoonViT-3D encoder.

name: MiniMax M2.5
desc: 230B params (10B active), MIT open-source. Performance rivaling Claude & GPT at 1/20th the cost. Top-5 globally on Artificial Analysis. 30% of MiniMax's internal tasks now completed by the model.
note: üí° M2.5 Lightning variant for ultra-fast real-time workflows

name: Qwen3.5
desc: Alibaba's latest: 397B-A17B MoE, native vision (early fusion), 201 languages supported. Hybrid Gated Delta Networks + MoE architecture. Self-reported benchmarks rival top US models.

name: Mistral Large 3
desc: French open-weight flagship: 675B total (41B active), MoE, multimodal & multilingual (40+ languages), 256K context. Devstral 2 (123B) hits 72.2% on SWE-Bench Verified ‚Äî 7x cheaper than Claude Sonnet.

name: Grok 4.20
desc: Teased by Musk. Expected to surpass Grok 4.1 benchmarks. Official details pending.

name: Claude Opus 4.6
desc: Improved task planning, reduced multi-step errors, deeper tool integrations. Extended thinking on roadmap.

name: GPT-5.3
desc: Next GPT-5 iteration reportedly in development. Enhancements in stability, efficiency, and instruction following.

name: Gemini 3.5
desc: Active development confirmed. Expected further gains on Gemini 3.1 with expanded multimodal & video capabilities.
